title: [K-12] Language Proficiency Enhancement Program through Group Learning Activities

context.additional_context: Language education program designing and executing group learning activities in blended (online/offline) environments using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners improve communication skills in the target language through at least three group activities (discussions, role-plays, projects) over four weeks
Learners participate in activities applying all eight components of the GLAID framework (interaction, learning objectives, assessment, task characteristics, etc.) with at least 80% engagement
Learners improve language expression accuracy by 20% through peer feedback exchange in group activities
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
